text: Gianfranco Dell'Innocenti (16 November 1925 – 20 September 2012) was an Italian professional footballer. He played for 12 seasons (287 games, 1 goal) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma, A.S. Lucchese Libertas 1905, SPAL 1907, Bologna F.C. 1909 and L.R. Vicenza. His grandson Cesare Rickler is a professional footballer as well. ==References== ==External links== Category:1925 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. title: Gianfranco Dell'Innocenti
